title: WireFeed
blurb: A RSS/Atom/JSON news ticker & API reader. Marquee, stack, or grid your headlines. CORS-safe fallbacks, filters, and theming.
description: WireFeed aggregates multiple RSS/Atom feeds and JSON news APIs into a single, configurable ticker. Choose marquee/stack/grid layouts, filter headlines by keywords, and theme the widget for dashboards, OBS overlays, or signage. Optional proxy endpoint supports feeds that block browser CORS.

versions.notes: Stack/grid views, proxy support, JSON API ingestion, and keyword filters.
Atom parsing, marquee improvements, duplicate suppression.
Multi-feed aggregation and sorting by recency.
